publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2501 Christina McKelvie: Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival—That the Parliament acknowledges the excellent work of Scotland’s firefighters, as detailed in research published by the Fire Brigades Union showing that 141 people per month are rescued from fires and vehicle crashes by fire crew, that 4,181 people were rescued from dwelling fires between 2001 and 2005 and that 4,280 people involved in road traffic collisions were rescued in the five years to 2005-06, the most recent year for which figures are available, and thanks our firefighters for their efforts to preserve lives across Scotland and bring hope, help, rescue and survival where there is tragedy and loss.

S3M-2501 Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival (lodged on 5 September 2008) Bob Doris*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Kidd*, Mike Pringle*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Wilson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Alex Neil*
S3M-2501 Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival (lodged on 5 September 2008) Jack McConnell*, Ian McKee*, Elaine Smith*, John Park*, Ken Macintosh*, Sandra White*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-2501 Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival (lodged on 5 September 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*, Brian Adam*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-2501 Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival (lodged on 5 September 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-2501 Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival (lodged on 5 September 2008) John Scott*
S3M-2501 Tragedy, Loss, Hope, Help, Rescue and Survival (lodged on 5 September 2008) Angela Constance*
